title: Hidden Formula
description: The Realm does not remember size. It remembers proportion. Change the scale, and the truth remains unchanged.

title: Pattern Finder
description: Growth is never the first sign. Repetition is. What repeats is what the system expects.

title: Logical Order
description: The system does not fail when steps are incorrect. It fails when they are executed out of order.

title: Binary Insight
description: The Genesis Block does not grow forward. It multiplies. Each step doubles the state that came before.

title: Final Connection
description: When ratios, patterns, sequences, and powers converge, the system does not resolve. It finalizes.
